columns.name: id
columns.description: The security findings provider-specific identifier for a finding.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the finding.

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: The name of the company for the product that generated the finding.

columns.name: confidence
columns.description: A finding's confidence. Confidence is defined as the likelihood that a finding accurately identifies the behavior or issue that it was intended to identify.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Indicates when the security-findings provider created the potential security issue that a finding captured.

columns.name: compliance_status
columns.description: The result of a compliance standards check.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Indicates when the security-findings provider last updated the finding record.

columns.name: criticality
columns.description: The level of importance assigned to the resources associated with the finding.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A finding's description.

columns.name: first_observed_at
columns.description: Indicates when the security-findings provider first observed the potential security issue that a finding captured.

columns.name: generator_id
columns.description: The identifier for the solution-specific component (a discrete unit of logic) that generated a finding.

columns.name: last_observed_at
columns.description: Indicates when the security-findings provider most recently observed the potential security issue that a finding captured.

columns.name: product_arn
columns.description: The ARN generated by Security Hub that uniquely identifies a product that generates findings.

columns.name: product_name
columns.description: The name of the product that generated the finding.

columns.name: record_state
columns.description: The record state of a finding.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The schema version that a finding is formatted for.

columns.name: source_url
columns.description: A URL that links to a page about the current finding in the security-findings provider's solution.

columns.name: verification_state
columns.description: Indicates the veracity of a finding.

columns.name: workflow_state
columns.description: [DEPRECATED] This column has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release. The workflow state of a finding.

columns.name: workflow_status
columns.description: The workflow status of a finding. Possible values are NEW, NOTIFIED, SUPPRESSED, RESOLVED.

columns.name: standards_control_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the security standard control.

columns.name: action
columns.description: Provides details about an action that affects or that was taken on a resource.

columns.name: compliance
columns.description: This data type is exclusive to findings that are generated as the result of a check run against a specific rule in a supported security standard, such as CIS Amazon Web Services Foundations.

columns.name: finding_provider_fields
columns.description: In a BatchImportFindings request, finding providers use FindingProviderFields to provide and update their own values for confidence, criticality, related findings, severity, and types.

columns.name: malware
columns.description: A list of malware related to a finding.

columns.name: network
columns.description: The details of network-related information about a finding.

columns.name: network_path
columns.description: Provides information about a network path that is relevant to a finding. Each entry under NetworkPath represents a component of that path.

columns.name: note
columns.description: A user-defined note added to a finding.

columns.name: patch_summary
columns.description: Provides an overview of the patch compliance status for an instance against a selected compliance standard.

columns.name: process
columns.description: The details of process-related information about a finding.

columns.name: product_fields
columns.description: A data type where security-findings providers can include additional solution-specific details that aren't part of the defined AwsSecurityFinding format.

columns.name: related_findings
columns.description: A list of related findings.

columns.name: remediation
columns.description: A data type that describes the remediation options for a finding.

columns.name: resources
columns.description: A set of resource data types that describe the resources that the finding refers to.

columns.name: severity
columns.description: A finding's severity.

columns.name: threat_intel_indicators
columns.description: Threat intelligence details related to a finding.

columns.name: user_defined_fields
columns.description: A list of name/value string pairs associated with the finding.

columns.name: vulnerabilities
columns.description: Provides a list of vulnerabilities associated with the findings.

columns.name: source_account_id
columns.description: The account id where the affected resource lives.

columns.name: title
columns.description: A finding's title.
